mapper.insert: insert into user_t(u_id, u_password, u_NAME, u_EMAIL, u_zipcode, u_ADDR, u_deaddr, u_PHONE, u_nick) VALUES(#{u_id}, #{u_password}, #{u_name}, #{u_email}, #{u_zipcode}, #{u_addr}, #{u_deaddr}, #{u_phone}, #{u_nick})
mapper.select: select u_id, u_password, u_name, u_email, u_zipcode, u_addr, u_deaddr, u_phone, u_nick, u_receive, u_point, u_lastlogin, u_regdate, u_update from user_t where u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.insert: insert into sns_user_t (id, name, email, sns_type) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{sns_type})
